title: save
description: Tsonga saves a break point to hold for 1-1

title: Break!
description: Jo sends his forehand wide at 30-40 to cough up the first break. Wawrinka 3-1

title: Break!
description: Stan is on fire right now; he breaks again to serve for the set at 5-1

title: Wawrinka 6-1
description: Stan saves a break point to take the opener in 26 minutes

title: save
description: Break point saved by Tsonga to hold for 1-0

title: Break!
description: Stan double faults to drop serve for the first time today. Tsonga 3-1

title: Tsonga 6-3
description: Much better serving from Jo in this set as he holds to square the match

title: Break!
description: Tsonga smacks a cross-court forehand out at 30-40 to drop his serve. Wawrinka 4-2

title: save
column6: and now Stan is serving for the set at 5-3

title: Wawrinka 6-3
column6: but he holds to close out the third

title: Break!
description: Wawrinka puts away a backhand volley at net to break immediately. 1-0

title: save
description: Stan strikes a backhand into the open court to break again. He will serve for the match at 5-2
